column4: heya peeps running 32bit 10.04 now my cpu supports 64 you reckon its worth the effort to switch and redo for 64bit?
heya peeps running 32bit 10.04 now my cpu supports 64 you reckon its worth the effort to switch and redo for 64bit?
to some extent maybe on your RAM, but mainly what you want to do on a computer
4gb ram would like to do some gaming/videos
I think you can Wine that maybe not though
aye that or i think theres a ntive support for it as well
yeah I guess go for 64bit,  it wont do any harm
also good idea to check your ISO before burning to CD and installing from it by the way#
indeed ive already trashed my system once with a bad iso
and you can do a sha1sum and sha2sum or whatever it is,  as well as an md5sum if you really want
